protocol.name: P-GSE30309-1
text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)
DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-2
protocol.text: Two days after germination, seedlings were transferred to a nutrient agar medium containing 1 microM of Dexamethasone (DEX).

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-3
protocol.text: Sterilized Arabidopsis seeds were plated on a nutrient agar medium and grown at 23 ËšC with a 16h-light/8h-dark cycle.

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-4
protocol.text: For each replicate, RNA was extracted from 60 seedlings using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (QIAGEN) accrding to the manufacturer's protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-5
protocol.text: Biotin-labelled cRNA was prepared using the Affymetrix GeneChip 3' IVT Expression Kit.

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-6
protocol.text: Hybridization, washing, and staining procedures were conducted with the Fluidics Station 450 as described in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-7
protocol.text: The scanning procedure was conducted with the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G as described in the GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual (Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE30309-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with Affymetrix GeneChip Operating Software (GCOS) using default analysis settings.
